attributes.comment:
It is totally absurb to create a fee increase as high as this. This is way beyond
what the mark of inflation is already at. It costs a small fortune to adopt children
internationally now and to increase the fees and create more of a burden
financially on adoptive parents is absurd. How can anyone afford the fees for this
and is it right to cause a child who is now a citizen to not have a certificate to hold
in their hands and be proud of due to a massive increase in fees? I have two
daughters who are eligible for this and I dont believe they will be getting one
anytime soon at what fees are currently being proposed. I guess I will have to tel
my daughters that their governemnts fees are the reason they cannot show this
certificate to anyone due to its high cost

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Alfred Tumielewicz
